definition: yes (used by Emperor or ruler)/OK/to accede/to assent
first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Yu Zhengsheng also called on local people to stay calm and keep vigilance.
sentences.chinese: 同時，俞正聲呼籲當地民衆保持冷靜並保持警覺。
